title: Ike Turner
summary: Izear Luster "Ike" Turner Jr. (November 5, 1931 â€“ December 12, 2007) was an American musician, bandleader, record producer, and talent scout. An early pioneer of 1950s rock and roll, he is best known for his work in the 1960s and 1970s with his then-wife Tina Turner as the leader of the Ike & Tina Turner Revue.
